content: Randy! 1. You should totally build this. 2. If you do, we’d *love* to hear all about it. 3. Related to #2, can you email us at developers@slack.com with the subject line “Platform blog submission” (don’t worry — we won’t post a blog or anything without discussing with you, we just want to make sure the right people see it).4. Did we mention you should really build this?
